title: Undergraduate Research Assistant in Machine Learning
author: Dr. Smith
description: Assist in developing machine learning models for healthcare applications. Great opportunity for undergraduates interested in AI and data science.

title: Remote Internship: Climate Data Analysis
author: Green Future Lab
description: Analyze global climate datasets and contribute to sustainability research. Flexible hours and remote participation allowed.

title: Business & Economics Research Fellow
author: UTD Economics Dept
description: Work with faculty to conduct survey-based research on entrepreneurship and social impact. Open to students from multiple majors.

title: Robotics Perception Assistant
author: Robotics Lab
description: Help build perception pipelines with camera/LiDAR fusion for mobile robots.

title: Bioinformatics Data Curation
author: Genomics Center
description: Curate gene/protein datasets and create clean benchmarks for downstream models.

title: Education Technology UX Study
author: HCI Group
description: Run user studies on classroom tools; qualitative coding and survey analysis.

title: Sustainability Dashboard Prototype
author: City Data Lab
description: Build a React dashboard for municipal energy metrics; collaborate with analysts.

title: Cybersecurity Log Analysis
author: Security Research Group
description: Analyze large-scale logs for anomaly detection and threat intelligence.

title: Medical Imaging Segmentation
author: Radiology AI Lab
description: Assist with dataset labeling and model evaluation for MRI segmentation.

title: Behavioral Economics Survey Study
author: Social Science Lab
description: Design and deploy online surveys; analyze results using R or Python.

title: Quantum Computing Literature Review
author: Quantum Systems Group
description: Summarize state-of-the-art quantum algorithms and simulators.

title: Assistive Tech App for Accessibility
author: Inclusive Tech Lab
description: Prototype an accessibility-focused mobile app and conduct usability tests.
